Docs.summary: Describes the thickness of a frame around a rectangle. Four values describe the , , , and sides of the rectangle, respectively.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This struct represents the .NET projection of the Windows Runtime (WinRT) `Thickness` struct. For more information, see [Thickness](https://docs.microsoft.com/uwp/api/windows.ui.xaml.thickness) in the UWP API reference.
